carrier_dhl_for_you_today_description: Shipments for DHL For You Today will always have the 'Same day delivery' option enabled
feature_allow_show_delivery_date_descrip: Shows delivery date at the options during checkout. When set to off, morning and evening delivery are not available.
save_customer_address_description: Switch this toggle on to automatically save address details of customers that place an order.
setting_carrier_cut_off_time_description: Time at which you stop processing orders for the day (format: hh:mm)
setting_carrier_delivery_days_window_des: Amount of days a customer can postpone a shipment.
setting_carrier_digital_stamp_descriptio: Price depends on weight. Is weight filled in correctly for all products? Choose 'No default weight' to let MyParcel calculate the right weight. Select a default weight if weight is not correctly filled in for every product.
setting_carrier_drop_off_days_descriptio: Days of the week on which you hand over parcels to %s
setting_carrier_drop_off_delay_descripti: Number of days you need to process an order.
setting_change_status_after_description: Change the order status after export or after printing the shipping label.
setting_country_of_origin_description: Country of origin is required for world shipments. Defaults to shop base.
setting_export_automatic_status_descript: Creates a shipment in MyParcel when the status of an order changes. Make sure to check 'Process shipments directly' to receive the barcode.
setting_modus_description: When activated, MyParcel will export the complete order including all details to the MyParcel Backoffice. Be aware of the fact that barcodes will not be shown in order notes, so don't use this option in combination with Channable for example.
setting_show_delivery_day_description: This option allows your customers to see the delivery date in order confirmations and My Account.
settings_carrier_delivery_day_descriptio: To allow :delivery_day delivery, :cutoff_day must be present in :delivery_days, and the cut-off time must be 15:00 or earlier.
settings_carrier_digital_stamp_default_w: Default weight of a digital stamp
settings_checkout_delivery_options_custo: Custom CSS for the delivery options
settings_checkout_display_for_descriptio: You can link the delivery options to specific shipping methods by adding them to the package types in "Standard export settings". The delivery options are not visible for foreign addresses.
settings_checkout_pickup_locations_defau: Default view for the pickup locations
settings_checkout_show_delivery_day_desc: Show the delivery day on the checkout page
settings_general_api_key_description: Enter your API key from the MyParcel backoffice here.
settings_order_empty_digital_stamp_weigh: Base weight of a digital stamp
settings_order_send_order_state_for_digi: Send order state for digital stamps
settings_trigger_manual_update_descripti: With this button your MyParcel account data will be fetched.
shipment_options_insured_amount_descript: Insure all parcels up to the selected amount.
shipment_options_insured_description: By default, there is no insurance on the shipments. If you still want to insure the shipment, you can do that. We insure the purchase value of the shipment, with a maximum insured value of € 5.000. Insured parcels always contain the options 'Home address only' en 'Signature for delivery'
shipment_options_insured_from_price_desc: Insure all orders that exceed this price point.
shipment_options_large_format_descriptio: Enable this option when your shipment is bigger than 100 x 70 x 50 cm, but smaller than 175 x 78 x 58 cm. An extra fee will be charged. Note! If the parcel is bigger than 175 x 78 x 58 of or heavier than 30 kg, the pallet rate will be charged.
shipment_options_large_format_from_weigh: Enter the weight in grams from which the Large package setting should be activated.
shipment_options_only_recipient_descript: If you don't want the parcel to be delivered at the neighbours, choose this option.
shipment_options_return_description: If it is not possible to deliver a package, it will be brought to a PostNL location where the recipient can pick up the package. If you prefer the package to be returned immediately instead of to a collection point, you can turn on the Return if no answer. This is mainly used for packages with perishable contents or very expensive products.
shipment_options_same_day_delivery_cutof: The time of day after which it is no longer possible for customers to order a same day shipment. Chosen timestamp should be between 0:00 and 10:00 AM
shipment_options_same_day_delivery_descr: Switch on to use the 'Same day delivery' option.
shipment_options_signature_description: The parcel will be offered at the delivery address. If the recipient is not at home, the parcel will be delivered to the neighbours. In both cases, a signature will be required.
